marklogic.body: You have a large dream in your heart to get your communication out to several people, and are terrified of the exposure, so you retain your self a effectively-concealed top Secret, all the while understanding you could do far more. This is a far also frequent circumstance for sensitive and spiritually-minded folks, for several reasons, not the minimum of which is the fact that the dread of currently being exposed and even Burned (virtually and figuratively) lives in our DNA as strong girls!
